-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS amadeus.member
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 ),
    email character varying(45) NOT NULL,
    password character varying(80) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS amadeus.role
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 ),
    authority character varying NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS amadeus.member_role
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 ),
    member_id integer NOT NULL,
    role_id integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS amadeus.airports
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    city character varying(45) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT airports_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS amadeus.flights
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    deperture_airport character varying(3) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    arrival_airport character varying(3) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    departure_date date NOT NULL,
    return_date date,
    price double precision NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT flights_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS amadeus.member_role
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (member_id)
    REFERENCES amadeus.member (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS amadeus.member_role
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (role_id)
    REFERENCES amadeus.role (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
